Two fun facts about Apple News: 1) Since the software update, the app constantly crashes the second I click on it. 2) Unless I missed it, they still don’t disclose if a subscriber gets ALL content to the publication. That should be a front-and-center disclosure.

So here’s the question: Do I cancel my WSJ subscription and subscribe to Apple News? I love the idea of central clearing houses for subscriptions (can’t subscribe to them all) but only if the content of those publications is unlimited. (Haven’t had time to look at the details.)
